item.title: Charge 5 Apple devices at once for under $80
item.description: Get a 5-device wireless charging station on sale for under $80 until August 4. It charges your iPhone, AirPods, Apple Watch, iPad, and Apple Pencil simultaneously.

item.title: Learn how to build your Amazon or Shopify business with a $25 online course
item.description: The Amazon FBA and Shopify Drop-Shipping Business Model and Strategies Bundle shows you how to start a business on both platforms, and it comes with automation tips for Amazon.
